abstract: D.E. Shaw, the $29 billion hedge fund, announced Wednesday that it had hired Michael Joseph, a former banker at Lloyds TSB, to head its fledgling European private equity unit, D. E. Shaw Direct Capital. Mr. Joseph, a former managing director of structured finance at Lloyds TSB, also served as an investment director at the British buyout shop 3i Group.
